subject: Influencer partnership enquiry — Social Trading Vlog (66K YouTube subscribers)
body:
Hi,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog — a YouTube channel and website covering social trading, copy trading, and online investing.

I'm reaching out because I'm expanding my content to cover more trading platforms, and I'd like to explore a partnership with XTB.

A quick overview of my platform:

- YouTube: 66,400+ subscribers, 4.5 million total views, 335 published videos
- Top video: 826,000+ views on a single video about retail trading
- Website: socialtradingvlog.com — SEO-optimised with interactive tools, comparison content, and educational guides
- International reach: full site content in 6 languages (English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Arabic)
- Audience: retail traders and investors actively comparing platforms and looking to open accounts
- Experience: nearly 10 years of documented, real-money trading since 2016

XTB is already featured on my interactive platform comparison tool at socialtradingvlog.com/calculators/compare-platforms/, and I'm producing detailed comparison articles that target high-intent keywords. My content focuses on honest, experience-based reviews — which I find converts far better than generic promotional content.

I see that XTB works directly with influencers and offers customised CPA models. Given the size and commercial intent of my audience, I'd like to discuss premium partnership terms:

- Enhanced CPA rates (I understand you offer up to $600 for Forex/Commodities in Group 1 markets)
- Whether a SpreadShare revenue model might complement CPA for long-term partnership value
- Content collaboration opportunities — I'd be happy to create dedicated XTB content
- A dedicated affiliate manager to help optimise the partnership

I'm based in Malta and happy to schedule a call or provide detailed analytics.

Best regards,
Tom West
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://www.youtube.com/socialtrading
